ygData.subject: OT: mail list management
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone tell the reason for letting reply only reply to the posting author on this list? The result is that most people do a reply to all which results

Can anyone tell the reason for letting "reply" only reply to the posting 
author on this list? The result is that most people do a "reply to all" 
which results in two duplicate replies on my mail client most of the time. 
Can it be changed?

Thanks, J�rn
